word_mean: 〔根据希腊神话中妇女Niobe命名，Niobe后变为石头〕铌：化学原素，原子序数41，原子量92.906，符号为Nb。过去曾称为columbium

sentence.Network_en: Niobium is the metallic element with the highest transition temperature.
sentence.Network_cn: 铌是转变温度最高的金属元素.

sentence.Network_en: A series of niobium acids at different calcination temperatures was prepared.
sentence.Network_cn: 在不同焙烧温度下制备了一系列固体铌酸催化剂.

sentence.Network_en: Among the high temperature nonferrous metals are molybdenum, niobium, tantalum, and tungsten.
sentence.Network_cn: 高温有色金属包括钼, 铌, 钽, 钨.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: modern Latin, from Niobe, by association with her father Tantalus (so named because the element was first found in tantalite)

means.word_mean: 1. a soft gray ductile metallic element used in alloys; occurs in niobite; formerly called columbium
